snippet: Four accused of involvement in Faisal Shahzad’s failed attempt to set off a car bomb in Times Square in 2010 were found not guilty.
abstract: Pakistani court acquits four men accused of assisting Faisal Shahzad, the Taliban-trained militant who tried to blow up a car bomb in Times Square in 2010; Pakistani authorities accused the four men of providing financial and logistical support to Shahzad.
lead_paragraph: Four accused of involvement in Faisal Shahzad’s failed attempt to set off a car bomb in Times Square in 2010 were found not guilty.

headline.seo: In Pakistan, 4 Acquitted in New York Bomb Plot
headline.main: Pakistan Acquits Four Men in Times Square Bomb Plot
headline.print_headline: 4 Are Acquitted by Pakistan In Times Square Bomb Plot
